WHEREAS it is expedient further to amend the Removal from Service (Special
Powers) Ordinance, 2000 (XVII of 2000), for the purposes hereinafter appearing;

14 THE GAZET.|E OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., MAY 16, 2OO3 [PARTI
89 of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of pakistan, the President is pleased
to make and promulgate the following Ordinance :-
l. Short titte and commencement.-( t ) This Ordinance may be
called the Removal from Service (Special Powers) (Second Amendment) Ordinance,
2n3.
2. Amendment of section 2, Ordinance XVII of 2000.-In the
Removal from service (Special Powers) prdinance, 2000 (XVII of 2000), hereinafter
referred to as the said Ordinance, in section 2,-
(a) clause (a) shall be omitted; and
(b) in clause (aa), for the words "Chief Executive", occurring twice, the
words "Prime Minister" shall be substituted.
(a) in sub-section (lL forthe words "Chief Executive", occurring thrice,
the words "Prime Minister" shall be substituted; and
(b) in sub-section (2), for the words "Chief Executive", occurring twice,
the words "Prime Minister" shall be substitued.
